Dirk.Gently.2010.12.16.Pilot.s00e01.ENG.SUBS.WEBRIP.[MPup]

Drama featuring writer Douglas Adams' holistic detective Dirk Gently, who operates based on the fundamental interconnectedness of all things. An investigation into a missing cat is inextricably linked to a chance encounter with an old friend, an exploding warehouse, a missing billionaire and a plate of biscuits.

[img]http://extraimago.com/images/2015/09/06/8d5d977d2d77da13438b6dad97fa8805.jpg[/img]

Dirk.Gently.s01e01.ENG.SUBS.WEBRIP

Gently discovers the connection between two seemingly-unrelated cases - a client who believes the Pentagon are trying to kill him and another whose horoscopes appear to be coming true. When mysteries collide, Dirk is the only man for the job.

[img]http://extraimago.com/images/2015/09/06/3d2a6d7ecae71a3eb9dca56b47a65254.jpg[/img]

Dirk.Gently.s01e02.ENG.SUBS.WEBRIP.[MPup]

Dirk is called back to his old university to protect a valuable robot but within 24 hours it has been stolen and a dead body discovered, with Dirk and Macduff the prime suspects.

[img]http://extraimago.com/images/2015/09/06/5392b8ca37bc4898bb57d5beea4e208a.jpg[/img]

Dirk.Gently.s01e03.ENG.SUBS.WEBRIP.[MPup]

Dirk's old clients are being randomly murdered with Dirk as the only link. Rather than talk to the police, Dirk elects to leave the country but is waylaid by a series of seemingly unconnected events.
